<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Delete users by ID list"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"delete"}
  path={"/api/v2.0/users/delete"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Permanently deletes multiple users by providing an array of user IDs.

**Use Cases**:
- Bulk offboarding of terminated employees
- Mass cleanup of graduated students
- Removing batch-imported test accounts

**Warning**: This action is permanent. All specified user accounts will be removed.

**Request Body**: Array of user UUIDs to delete.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"description":"Array of user IDs to delete.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"description":"Array of user UUIDs to delete."},"example":["51c89694-ae9f-f011-8e61-6045bd7991ab","62d9a705-bf10-f011-8e61-6045bd7991ac"]}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Users deleted successfully.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Response envelope returned after successfully deleting multiple resources in bulk. Based on C# `ListDeleteResponse` from `Spark.Shared.Models.Responses`.","properties":{"Ids":{"type":"array","description":"Array of UUIDs for the deleted resources","items":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}},"UserToken":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"Authenticated session identifier"},"RequestDate":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"Timestamp when the API processed the request"},"ExecutionTime":{"type":"number","format":"double","description":"Server-side execution time in milliseconds"},"StatusCode":{"type":"integer","description":"HTTP status code (typically 200 for successful delete)","example":200},"Message":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Optional informational message"},"ServerName":{"type":"string","description":"Application node that processed the request"},"ProcessId":{"type":"integer","description":"Internal process identifier for diagnostics"},"OperationId":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Trace identifier for log correlation"}},"required":["StatusCode"],"title":"ListDeleteResponse"},"example":{"Ids":["51c89694-ae9f-f011-8e61-6045bd7991ab","62d9a705-bf10-f011-8e61-6045bd7991ac"],"StatusCode":200,"Message":"2 users deleted successfully."}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
